text: Ratnavel Pandian (13 February 1929 – 28 February 2018) was an Indian judge who was a member of the Supreme Court from 1988 to 1994, and chief justice of Madras High Court in 1988.Former SC judge Ratnavel Pandian passes away He headed the Fifth Pay Commission. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Chief Justices of the Madras High Court Category:Justices of the Supreme Court of India
title: Ratnavel Pandian
